**Transfection of Target Cells with dCas9 and sgRNA Expression Vectors**
Seed 12-well cell culture plates with 6x10<sup>4</sup> HEK293T cells in 1 mL DMEM/GlutaMAX supplemented with 10% FBS per well.
Prepare the transfection complexes, scaling up the mixture masses and volumes as needed:
Combine the following expression vector DNAs.
Add this 1 μg DNA mixture to 100 μL Opti-MEM Reduced-Serum Medium in a micro
Mix well by pipetting up and down.
Add 3 μL Mirus TransIT-LT1 Transfection Reagent into the same tube.
Mix well by pipetting up and down.
Allow transfection complexes to form for 30 min at room temperature.
Add 100 μL of the transfection mixture to each well of the 12-well
**Induction of Target Cells with Abscisic acid/Gibberellin**
Prepare small molecules for induction as follows:
Prepare 500x concentrated stocks of abscisic acid and gibberellin.
Abscisic acid: Dissolve 13.22 mg abscisic acid in 1 mL DMSO to make a 50 mM solution.
Dissolve 2.09 mg gibberellic acid acetyoxymethyl ester in 1 mL DMSO to make a 5 mM solution.
These stocks can be stored at -20°C.
Add 2 μL of the 500x concentrated stocks of abscisic acid and/or gibberellin to each well of the 12-well
Add DMSO in parallel such that 4 μL total volume of \(DMSO + abscisic acid + gibberellin) are added to each well.
i. Aspirate cell culture media from each well.
Add 300 μL Versene solution per well, and
Incubate 5 min at 37°C and 5% CO2 to
Transfer Versene solution containing dissociated cells into one microfuge tube per well.
Centrifuge 2 min at 3,500 RPM in a microcentrifuge.
9. Prepare a blocking buffer containing 10% FBS in DPBS.
Aspirate Versene solution from pelleted cells, taking care not to disturb the cell pellet.
Suspend cells in 375 μL blocking buffer by pipetting up and down.
Prepare staining solutions as follows, scaling up volumes as needed:
Add 0.2 μL APC-CXCR4 antibody \(1:500, final concentration 0.4 μg/mL) and 0.5 μL PE-CD95 antibody \(1:200, final concentration 0.5 μg/mL) to 100 μL 10% FBS in PBS.
Add 0.2 μL APC IgG2 antibody \(1:500, final concentration 0.4 μg/mL) or 0.25 μL PE IgG1 antibody \(1:400, final concentration 0.5 μg/mL) to 100 μL 10% FBS in PBS.
Aspirate blocking buffer from pelleted cells, taking care not to disturb the cell pellet.
Suspend cells in 100 μL staining solution by pipetting up and down.
Incubate cells 1 h at room temperature protected from light.
Aspirate staining solution from pelleted cells, taking care not to disturb the cell pellet.
Suspend cells in 375 μL blocking buffer by pipetting up and down.
